> How are you going to apply the changes? Do you have access to the 
source code, or are you going to disassemble the binaries (or other 
cracking methods)?

I'm not even sure what source code is still around so I can't 
speculate on how to implement changes.  Right now, I would rather put 
together a list of changes that I consider implementable.  Not all the 
changes we would want are implementable (there are limits on how much 
we can improve chain-lightnings efficiency because of the way the code 
was written.)

If anyone wants to see my list, I'll upload it.
